# The `AllocaSliceRewriter` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Visitor to rewrite instructions using p particular slice of an alloca to use a new alloca. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Visitor to rewrite instructions using p particular slice of an alloca to use a new alloca.

Also implements the rewriting to vector-based accesses when the partition passes the isVectorPromotionViable predicate. Most of the rewriting logic lives here.

Definition at line 2629 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/sroa-cpp">SROA.cpp</a>.

### getIntegerSplat() {#ac2cf5943490074b99830c66579f6d7b2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Value &#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;SROA.cpp&#125;::AllocaSliceRewriter::getIntegerSplat (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; V, unsigned Size)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Compute an integer value from splatting an i8 across the given number of bytes.

Note that this routine assumes an i8 is a byte. If that isn&#39;t true, don&#39;t call this routine. FIXME: Heed the advice above.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="V">The i8 value to splat.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Size">The number of bytes in the output (assuming i8 is one byte)</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/sroa-cpp/#l03135">3135</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/sroa-cpp">SROA.cpp</a>.

### getSliceAlign() {#a2b8340bf4ff490ce304688aa27d28dac}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Align anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;SROA.cpp&#125;::AllocaSliceRewriter::getSliceAlign ()</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Compute suitable alignment to access this slice of the <em>new</em> alloca.

You can optionally pass a type to this routine and if that type&#39;s ABI alignment is itself suitable, this will return zero.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/sroa-cpp/#l02818">2818</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/sroa-cpp">SROA.cpp</a>.

### rewriteIntegerLoad() {#ac9ffa08ad302cf033fdc741f0cb4ead8}

<MemberDefinition
